game.name: 我在忘川有個活
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Custom Volume Controls, Playable without Timed Input, Steam Cloud, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: A Chinese underworld-themed TD game. Alter paths with anchors, build towers freely. Boost tower stats/effects by brewing the Pot of Oblivion with herbs. Place talisman traps on paths. Features varied maps, initial path challenges, and strategic obstacles.
game.shortDescriptionEn: A Chinese underworld-themed TD game. Alter paths with anchors, build towers freely. Boost tower stats/effects by brewing the Pot of Oblivion with herbs. Place talisman traps on paths. Features varied maps, initial path challenges, and strategic obstacles.
